CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Date_of_Birth__c ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( Date_of_Birth__c ) , DAY( Date_of_Birth__c ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Date_of_Birth__c ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Date_of_Birth__c ) -1 ), null)
CustomField.label: Patients Age
